news.title: Mothers Against Genocide release new version of 'A Woman’s Heart' for Palestine, featuring Mary Black, Róisín el Cherif, Ríoghnach Connolly and more
news.summary: Find more information on how to purchases the song below.

news.title: Dave Lofts: "I’m a firm believer in that thing of there being only two types of music – good and bad"
news.summary: Dave Lofts is the only musician to have opened for both Wolf Alice and The Wolfe Tones. Mental health, serving in the Irish Army, Shane MacGowan, smelly pubs and bleeding for your fans are all discussed.

news.title: New Belfast record label Confused Panda sign their first artist
news.summary: Confused Panda Records say they take inspiration from other labels like XL and Domino

news.title: Electric Picnic announces Croí line-up – featuring Andy Irvine, David Holmes, Brigid Mae Power, David Keenan and more
news.summary: The stage will also play host to Fionn Regan, Ispíní na hÉireann. The Bonny Men, Paddy Mulcahy, Áine Tyrrell, Qbanaa, Dani Larkin, Eoghan Ó Ceannabháin, Post Punk Podge & the Technohippies, Lucy McWilliams, and more

news.title: Trump "seriously considering" presidential pardon for Sean 'Diddy' Combs
news.summary: According to Trump administration sources, the question of a pardon for Diddy has advanced from "just another Trump weave to an actionable event."

news.title: Hardwicke Circus: Rock 'n' Roll Returns to Ukraine - The Complete Tour Diary
news.summary: Carlisle rockers Hardwicke Circus recently became the first UK or Irish band to undertake a tour of Ukraine since the invasion began over three years ago.

news.title: TG4 announces broadcast schedule for Fleadh Cheoil na hÉireann 2025
news.summary: The broadcast weekend will feature acts such as Kabin Krew, Seán Keane, and Iarla Ó Lionáird

news.title: Hugh Lane Gallery to close for "at least three years" for refurbishment
news.summary: The gallery will close its doors from September 28 for the refurbishment

news.title: Palestinian boxers to tour Ireland in August
news.summary: All proceeds from the Belfast event will go to two Palestinian organisations helping children and families in Gaza and the West Bank.

news.title: Jack Reynor to star in Apple TV+'s Presumed Innocent season 2
news.summary: Season 2 of Presumed Innocent is based on the upcoming novel, Dissection of a Murder, written by Jo Murray.
